coreAttributes.name: Raptor energy drink
coreAttributes.description: A brightly-coloured can of caffeinated, Raptor-branded energy drink. On the reverse label there's a graphic image of a wild-eyed eagle-girl pinning a timid-looking rabbit-boy down and riding his cock.
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
A powerful jolt of energy surges through [npc.namePos] body!

[#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_HEALTH_MAXIMUM, 5)] [#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_CRITICAL_DAMAGE, 5)]

useDescriptions.selfUse: Popping open the cap, [npc.name] [npc.verb(bring)] the can of Raptor energy drink up to [npc.her] [npc.mouth]. A sweet, artificial smell rises from the opening, and as [npc.she] [npc.verb(tilt)] [npc.her] head back and [npc.verb(start)] drinking the fizzy liquid, [npc.she] quickly [npc.verb(find)] [npc.herself] feeling full of energy.
useDescriptions.otherUse: Popping open the cap, [npc.name] [npc.verb(bring)] the can of Raptor energy drink up to [npc2.namePos] waiting [npc2.lips]. A sweet, artificial smell rises from the opening, and as [npc2.name] [npc2.verb(tilt)] [npc2.her] head back and [npc2.verb(start)] drinking the fizzy liquid, [npc2.she] quickly [npc2.verb(find)] [npc2.herself] feeling full of energy.
